channel.title: Dumping frames etc
channel.description: How exactly would you dump the frames, npc ids, item ids and things of that nature from runescape with the client?

item.title: Dumping frames etc
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:4, topic:251292”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=331663.msg2589031#msg2589031 date=1229656822]
all of that is probably saved in an array, find the arrays then dump them in a for loop.
[/quote]
I don’t see why they would load all that data into memory…Would it not make more sense to just read the data from the cache when it’s needed? Or better yet only load the data needed for the current region.

I wonder if semaphore still reads these boards…[/quote]

yes my bad, not all of it saved to arrays they probably load only what they need, so just find their loading method, and use it to load things and dump them

Read full topic

item.title: Dumping frames etc
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

nueb35:

all of that is probably saved in an array, find the arrays then dump them in a for loop.

I don’t see why they would load all that data into memory…Would it not make more sense to just read the data from the cache when it’s needed? Or better yet only load the data needed for the current region.

I wonder if semaphore still reads these boards…

Read full topic
